title: California Firm Recalls Ground Beef Products Due To Possible E. coli O157:H7 Contamination
summary: Editor's Note, May 20, 2010: The distribution of the product subject to recall has been amended to wholesalers, restaurants, institutions, and federal establishments for further processing. WASHINGTON, May 15, 2010 - Montclair Meat Co., Inc., a Montclair, Calif., establishment is recalling approximately 53,000 pounds of...
impacted_products: Various pound packages of "MONTCLAIR MEAT CO. GROUND BEEF"
Various pound packages of "MONTCLAIR MEAT CO. ALL BEEF PATTIES"
